channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Energy -- Retail Operations
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hitachi Energy -- Retail Operations

item.title: CVE-2021-35528|2024-08-04T00:40:47.323Z -- hitachi%20energy -- retail%20operations
item.description: Improper Access Control vulnerability in the application authentication and authorization of Hitachi Energy Retail Operations, Counterparty Settlement and Billing (CSB) allows an attacker to execute a modified signed Java Applet JAR file. A successful exploitation may lead to data extraction or modification of data inside the application. This issue affects: Hitachi Energy Retail Operations 5.7.3 and prior versions. Hitachi Energy Counterparty Settlement and Billing (CSB) 5.7.3 prior versions.
